cards.effect: If you have more Prize cards remaining than your opponent, the Pokémon this card is attached to takes 40 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Earthen Vessel
cards.effect:
You can use this card only if you discard another card from your hand.

Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Future Booster Energy Capsule
cards.effect: The Future Pokémon this card is attached to has no Retreat Cost, and the attacks it uses do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Larry
cards.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 2 Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If tails, search your deck for a Basic Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Luxurious Cape
cards.effect: If the Pokémon this card is attached to doesn't have a Rule Box, it gets +100 HP, and if it is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, that player takes 1 more Prize card. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

cards.name: Mela
cards.effect:
You can use this card only if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.

Attach a Basic {R} Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

cards.name: Norman
cards.effect: Draw 2 cards. If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, draw 2 more cards.

cards.name: Parasol Lady
cards.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards. If you go second and it's your first turn, draw 8 cards instead.

cards.name: Professor Sada's Vitality
cards.effect: Choose up to 2 of your Ancient Pokémon and attach a Basic Energy card from your discard pile to each of them. If you attached any Energy in this way, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Professor Turo's Scenario
cards.effect: Put 1 of your Pokémon in play into your hand. (Discard all cards attached to that Pokémon.)

cards.name: Rika
cards.effect: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put 2 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards and put them on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Roark
cards.effect: Draw 2 cards. Put a Basic Energy card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Shauntal
cards.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot. If tails, switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Snorlax Doll
cards.effect:
If this card is in your hand when you are setting up to play, you may put it face down in the Active Spot or on your Bench as if it were a 120-HP Basic {C} Pokémon. (You can do this only when you are setting up to play.) At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play.

This card can't be affected by any Special Conditions and can't retreat. If this card is Knocked Out, your opponent can't take any Prize cards for it.

cards.name: Technical Machine: Blindside
cards.effect: The Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.) If this card is attached to 1 of your Pokémon, discard it at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Technical Machine: Devolution
cards.effect: The Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.) If this card is attached to 1 of your Pokémon, discard it at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Technical Machine: Evolution
cards.effect: The Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.) If this card is attached to 1 of your Pokémon, discard it at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Technical Machine: Turbo Energize
cards.effect: The Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.) If this card is attached to 1 of your Pokémon, discard it at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Techno Radar
cards.effect:
You can use this card only if you discard another card from your hand.

Search your deck for up to 2 Future Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Tulip
cards.effect: Put up to 4 in any combination of {P} Pokémon and Basic {P} Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Crag Bash
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 100 less damage from attacks from Evolution Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Protect
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Slime Mold Colony
abilities.effect: Cards in your opponent's discard pile can't be put into their hand by an effect of your opponent's Abilities or Trainer cards.

attacks.name: Mushroom Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scorching Heater
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if it is Knocked Out), put 6 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

abilities.name: Thermal Reactor
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when this Pokémon moves from your Bench to the Active Spot, you may move any amount of {R} Energy from your other Pokémon to it.

attacks.name: Heat Ray
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Heat Ray.

attacks.name: Ice Shard
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {F} Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Buoyant Healing
attacks.effect: Heal 120 damage from 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sneaky Snacking
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

abilities.name: Fillet Memento
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, move up to 2 {W} Energy cards from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Plus Damage
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Buddy Pulse
abilities.effect: If you have Plusle in play, whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card from their hand to 1 of their Pokémon, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon. The effect of Buddy Pulse doesn't stack.

attacks.name: Wild Charge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Flail Around
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Stance
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may prevent all damage from and effects of attacks from your opponent's Pokémon done to this Pokémon until the end of your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Glittering Eyes
attacks.effect: If Tulip is in your discard pile, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Continuous Coin Toss
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Swelling Power
attacks.effect: Attach a Basic {F} Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Magma Purge
attacks.effect: Discard up to 4 Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Three-Step Strike
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Whip Expert
attacks.effect: If you attached a Pokémon Tool card from your hand to this Pokémon during this turn, this attack does 70 more damage.

abilities.name: Far-Flying Meteor
abilities.effect: During your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gravitational Tackle
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each {C} in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.

abilities.name: Energizing Rock Salt
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic {F} Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, heal 30 damage from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Stomp Off
attacks.effect: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Burning Turbulence
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 90 damage to itself. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Chuck
attacks.effect: Discard any number of Pokémon Tool cards from your hand. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Venomous Hit
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Cross-Cut
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Dark Edge
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: In a Hungry Hurry
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has no Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Energizer Wheel
attacks.effect: Move 2 {D} Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Toxic Powder
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon has an Ancient Booster Energy Capsule attached, you may make both Active Pokémon Poisoned.

attacks.name: Rampaging Hammer
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Spinning Needles
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Spinning Needles attack does 100 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Mysterious Shield
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon ex and Pokémon V.

attacks.name: Hard Bashing
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Filch
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Bind Wound
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Buggy Turbo
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, attach up to 4 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon. If tails, discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energized Attack
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Driving Buddy
attacks.effect: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Homing Headbutt
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 3 of your opponent's Pokémon that have any damage counters on them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Baryon Beam
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Future Booster Energy Capsule attached, this attack can be used for {C}{C}{C}.

abilities.name: Evanescent
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out, flip a coin. If heads, your opponent takes 1 fewer Prize card.

attacks.name: Frost Bullet
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Crimson Armor
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has full HP, it takes 80 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Scorching Bazooka
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 more damage for each {R} Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hydro Lander
attacks.effect: Attach up to 3 Basic {F} Energy cards from your discard pile to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Sonic Dive
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Icicle Sole
attacks.effect: Put damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon until its remaining HP is 30.

attacks.name: Trop Kick
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon, and it recovers from all Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Swing and Skedaddle
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, switch it with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Vengeful Shock
attacks.effect: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 90 more damage, and your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Extreme Current
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Amp You Very Much
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, take 1 more Prize card.

abilities.name: Gold Coffin
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Hollow Hands
attacks.effect: Put 5 damage counters on your opponent's Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

abilities.name: Tachyon Bits
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when this Pokémon moves from your Bench to the Active Spot, you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Laser Blade
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Energy Crush
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bandit's Fist
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Bandit's Fist.

attacks.name: Knocking Hammer
attacks.effect: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Gaia Punk
attacks.effect: Discard 3 {L} Energy from your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Magnetic Absorption
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if your opponent has 4 or fewer Prize cards remaining, you may attach a Basic {F} Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Earthen Spike
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Frenzied Gouging
attacks.effect: Knock Out your opponent's Active Pokémon. If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out in this way, this Pokémon does 200 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Calamity Storm
attacks.effect: You may discard a Stadium in play. If you do, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Peerless Edge
attacks.effect: This attack does 70 damage for each Prize card you have taken.

attacks.name: Double-Edged Slash
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Coin Bonus
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may draw a card. If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, draw 1 more card.

attacks.name: Make It Rain
attacks.effect: Discard any number of Basic Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

abilities.name: Humming Heal
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Light Pulse
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent's Pokémon done to this Pokémon. (Damage is not an effect.)

abilities.name: Solidarity
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon for each of your Tandemaus, Maushold, and Maushold ex in play.

attacks.name: Nom-Nom-Nom Incisors
attacks.effect: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Fast Carrier
attacks.effect: If you go first, you can use this attack during your first turn. Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Shadowy Wind
attacks.effect: You may put this Pokémon and all attached cards into your hand.

cards.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 2 Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If tails, search your deck for a Basic Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.effect: The Retreat Cost of each Basic Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) is {C} less.
